meanings.definition: A type of fish found in cold waters.
meanings.sent1: Coalfishes swim gracefully in the icy ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of coalfishes while snorkeling in Alaska.
meanings.sent3: Why did the coalfishes bring ice cubes to the party? They wanted to keep things cool!
meanings.sent4: The coalfishes glided through the water like shadows in the night.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the coalfishes sparkled under the moonlight.

meanings.sent1: Many coalfishes were caught by the fishermen.
meanings.sent2: The market was full of fresh coalfishes for sale.
meanings.sent3: The coalfishes gathered for a meeting to discuss their next move.
meanings.sent4: The coalfishes in the tank seemed to be having a lively conversation.
meanings.sent5: The coalfishes darted around the aquarium, their colors blending together.
